OOC: Finally I can use his robot mode weapons.

::Aerotaur::
    He continues glaring but flings his wings back.  He transforms into his 
robot mode but his left wing is in pain.  He had tried to use it to deflect 
the shot but it must have been stronger than he anticipated.  "No matter, I 
will still defeat you!"  Out of each of his arms emerge double barreled 
blasters (similar to the original Optimus Primal's only more menacing).  He 
tries to move his wing but it is still stiff and sore from the shot.  He 
grimaces "I will have to fight on the ground for now."  He spots Trinity and 
dives forward.  He places his right wing between her and Deemos and uses it 
to try and knock her backwards.  This done he lands and springs back out of 
the way.
